channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 08:24 The threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 08:24 The threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 08:16 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.

item.title: 🟡 08:15 Failure to alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 08:15 Failure to alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
